author: becka11y
msg: Added support for W3C battery status events

With com.phonegap.battery installed, call window.addEventListenter to add batterystatus, batterylow or batterycritical events. This will cause a call into iOS to start monitoring battery events.  Call window.removeEventListner for these events to stop monitoring battery events.  Uses nearly the same battery.js implementation as Android - just the name of the plugin is different.
